function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Confounding variables not identified in some studies","Impact":"Inaccurate understanding of the relationship between temperature, humidity, and virus spread","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive studies that take into account all confounding variables","Technologies":"Advanced statistical analysis and modeling techniques","People":"Researchers, epidemiologists","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Use of simple correlation in statistical analysis","Impact":"Inability to establish cause-and-effect relationship between variables","Mitigation":"Employ advanced statistical analysis methods (e.g., regression, causal inference)","Technologies":"Advanced statistical modeling software","People":"Data analysts, statisticians","Owner":"Research institutions, academic institutions"},{"Description":"Complex relationship between social and meteorological factors in coronavirus outbreaks","Impact":"Difficulty in accurately explaining the spread of the virus based solely on climatic conditions","Mitigation":"Integrate social factors and meteorological factors in outbreak analyses","Technologies":"Integrated modeling and analysis approaches","People":"Epidemiologists, public health researchers","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"}]}
